mapper.select: select i.id as item_id, i.name, i.price, i.item_info, i.gender, i.deleted, sh.id as shop_id, sh.shop_name, sh.shop_name_kana, sh.shop_detail, sh.image_pass as shop_image_pass, sh.deleted, ca.id as category_id, ca.category, co.id as color_id, co.color, st.size_id as size_id, si.size, st.color_id as color_id, co.color, st.stock, im.id as image_id, im.image_pass, im.item_id from items as i left join category as ca on i.category_id = ca.id left join shops as sh on i.shop_id = sh.id left join stock as st on i.id = st.item_id left join color as co on st.color_id = co.id left join size as si on st.size_id = si.id left join images as im on i.id = im.item_id
